data.title: Museum Passes
data.meta_description: The Manchester Public Library's museum passes allow free or reduced admission to venues for varying group sizes/ages.
data.text:
The Manchester Public Library's museum passes allow free or reduced admission to venues for varying group sizes/ages. Ask a library staff member (860-643-2471) for details on individual passes.

Passes are available at the checkout desk in the Mary Cheney Library.

Passes may be checked out for one week. Please do not return passes in the book drop and return passes on time, because other families may be waiting for them. View museum brochure HERE(PDF, 200KB) .

Deerfield, MA

The selection of passes owned by the library may vary. Please check the library's catalog to list our current selection- Search "museum passes." Refine by "Collections", Manchester Main Library or call the Library for assistance 860-643-2471.

Many thanks for the Friends of the Manchester Public Library for supporting and sponsoring this important and popular program. If you'd like to get involved and be an active library supporter, join the Friends today.
